thread.title: Gates Recreation and Parks to host fall activities
thread.title_full: Gates Recreation and Parks to host fall activities

title: Gates Recreation and Parks to host fall activities
text: Gates Recreation and Parks to host fall activities Comment Posted Oct. 1, 2015 at 11:16 AM Posted Oct. 1, 2015 at 11:16 AM The Gates Recreation and Parks Department, 1605 Buffalo Road, will host the following upcoming events. Gentle Yoga: 6 to 7:15 p.m. Tuesdays, Oct. 13-Dec. 15. This 10-week course will focus on using yoga to promote stress reduction and invite relaxation. Registration is required by Oct. 14. Price is $86 for residents and $92 for nonresidents ages 18 and older. Aromatherapy/Essential Oils: 6:30 to 8 p.m. Oct. 14. This class will focus on ways to use essential oils in daily life and will allow participants to create their own oil. Registration is required by Oct. 14. Price is $20 for residents and $26 for nonresidents ages 18 and older. For registration and more information, visit gatesrecparks.org . Gates-Chili Post
